name: Untitled Dungeon Game (CyrilleFrouin)
description:
You just acquired your own dungeon! But adventurers dare to come invade your dungeon, protect your treasures and your life, recruit mercenaries to protect your dungeon and live as long as you can!

This game is my entry for the 42Jam #2.

Controls: Drag&Drop a unit into the room you want to buy it for
